name: The Leftovers
overview:
When 2% of the world's population abruptly disappears without explanation, the world struggles to understand just what they're supposed to do about it. The drama series 'The Leftovers' is the story of the people who didn't make the cut.

Based on the bestselling novel by Tom Perrotta, 'The Leftovers' follows Kevin Garvey, a father of two andÂ the chief of police in a small New York suburb, as he tries to maintain some semblance of normalcy when the notion no longer applies.
